name: To the Surface and Beyond
description:
To the Surface and Beyond is action-platformer game. Dead Cells, rogue-lite, metroidvania inspired.

Story:

You awake from a middle of the Earth and start your journey to the surface, and beyond...

Features:

  • Game currently offers one quite small but fun level! (cave)
  • Save & Load function
  • 1 Boss
  • 1 Skill
  • 0 special powers
  • This First version offers 15-30 minutes fun
  • Notice that Game menu font colours and game translations are not the best ones at the moment, we'll fix them on the next update.

Game is in development, and there will be a lots of improvements to the current character, new enemies, new levels...

Features added in near future/end product:

  • New amazing actor character (replacing the current one)
  • Hours of fun
  • 15-20 levels - Each one with its secrets to discover, own atmosphere and foes
  • 10 Bosses
  • Plenty of weapons and skills - Swords, Guns, Spears...
  • 4 special ability
  • Fun to play combat system
